title: Flat rate
method_description: Lets you charge a fixed rate for shipping.

title.label: Method title
title.description: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
title.tip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

cost.label: Cost
cost.description:
Enter a cost (excl. tax) or sum, e.g. 10.00 * [qty].

Use [qty] for the number of items,
[cost] for the total cost of items, and [fee percent="10" min_fee="20" max_fee=""] for percentage based fees.
cost.tip:
Enter a cost (excl. tax) or sum, e.g. 10.00 * [qty].

Use [qty] for the number of items,
[cost] for the total cost of items, and [fee percent="10" min_fee="20" max_fee=""] for percentage based fees.

class_costs.label: Shipping class costs
class_costs.description: These costs can optionally be added based on the product shipping class.
class_costs.tip: These costs can optionally be added based on the product shipping class.

class_cost_92.label: "Express" shipping class cost
class_cost_92.description:

[cost] for the total cost of items, and [fee percent="10" min_fee="20" max_fee=""] for percentage based fees.

[cost] for the total cost of items, and [fee percent="10" min_fee="20" max_fee=""] for percentage based fees.

options.class: Per class: Charge shipping for each shipping class individually
options.order: Per order: Charge shipping for the most expensive shipping class

title: Free shipping
method_description: Free shipping is a special method which can be triggered with coupons and minimum spends.

title.label: Title
title.description: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
title.tip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

options.either: A minimum order amount OR a coupon
options.both: A minimum order amount AND a coupon

min_amount.label: Minimum order amount
min_amount.description: Users will need to spend this amount to get free shipping (if enabled above).
min_amount.tip: Users will need to spend this amount to get free shipping (if enabled above).
